name: Slime Field
description:
You are an adventurer sent to a field with a simple goal: Kill the king slime.

However, you are too low leveled and there are a limited amount of slimes around.

Luckily you were supplied with rewind potions which will rewind the time around the field so you can freely grind for EXP until you are strong enough to kill the king slime.

Control
Tab: Stats Bar

R: Rewind

Left Mouse: Slash

Pro Tip
If your health reaches 0 you will automatically rewind, but you will also lose all your EXP. Be sure to rewind if your HP is very low.
